text: Sidi Mohamed Ould Cheikh Abdallahi (; 1938"Bio express", Jeuneafrique.com, February 25, 2007. – 22 November 2020) was a Mauritanian politician. He was President of Mauritania from 2007 to 2008."Mauritania swears in new president", Al Jazeera, April 19, 2007. He was removed from office in a military coup d'état on August 6, 2008. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Presidents of Mauritania
title: Sidi Ould Cheikh Abdallahi
